sentences.en: ...her extraordinary dignity and composure.
sentences.cn: …她无与伦比的高贵与冷静。

sentences.en: All the Greenpeace people behaved with impressive forbearance and dignity.
sentences.cn: 所有绿色和平组织人士表现出了超乎寻常的克制和大度。

sentences.en: an appearance of quiet dignity
sentences.cn: 肃穆的神态

sentences.en: He considered the job beneath his dignity.
sentences.cn: 他认为这种工作有失身份.

sentences.en: He sat with such regal dignity.
sentences.cn: 他端坐在那里，浑身透着王者的威严。

sentences.en: He suffered a long series of illnesses with tremendous dignity and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 他凭借超乎常人的保持生命尊严的信念和顽强意志力忍受着各种病痛的折磨。

sentences.en: I struggled to regain some dignity.
sentences.cn: 我努力恢复自己的一点儿尊严。

sentences.en: Only a truly free person has human dignity.
sentences.cn: 只有真正自由的人才具有人的尊严.

sentences.en: Peter swept in, with his dignity and insolence.
sentences.cn: 彼得神气十足, 目空一切地走了进来.

sentences.en: Prisoners should be treated with regard for human dignity .
sentences.cn: 对待囚犯应该考虑到人的尊严。

sentences.en: Quiet dignity under fire , real class.
sentences.cn: 遭到攻击时表现出的沉默尊严真是高招.

sentences.en: She accepted the criticism with quiet dignity.
sentences.cn: 她大度地接受了批评。

sentences.en: She always comports herself with great dignity.
sentences.cn: 她的举止总是很端庄。

sentences.en: She looks terrible, shorn of all her beauty and dignity.
sentences.cn: 失去了美貌和尊严，她看上去糟透了。

sentences.en: She's got too much dignity to descend to writing anonymous letters.
sentences.cn: 她是个自尊心很强的人，绝不会自贬身份去写匿名信。

sentences.en: The act would be below the national dignity.
sentences.cn: 这种行为有失国格.

sentences.en: There was elegance and simple dignity in the way he bore himself.
sentences.cn: 他举止优雅而庄重。

sentences.en: They carried themselves with great pride and dignity.
sentences.cn: 他们举手投足间透着傲气和高贵。

sentences.en: They have to be treated well, with dignity.
sentences.cn: 必须善待申请人，让人有尊严。

sentences.en: This award must be shared with everyone who strives for justice and dignity.
sentences.cn: 我一定要与所有为正义和尊严奋斗的人分享此奖。

sentences.en: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.cn: 我们这样做是因为我们相信每个人的尊严和价值。

words.tran_cn: 庄严的；有尊严的；高贵的
使高贵；增威严；授以荣誉

trans.tran_en: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation
